scripts.apigateway: cd apigateway && npm install && npm start
scripts.add: cd add && npm install && npm start
scripts.divide: cd divide && npm install && npm start
scripts.multiply: cd multiply && npm install && npm start
scripts.sub: cd sub && npm install && npm start
scripts.pow: cd pow && npm install && npm start
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run add" "npm run apigateway" "npm run divide" "npm run multiply" "npm run sub" "npm run pow"
